page.title: 14Children's Clothes
page.content: We have school clothes, play clothes and going out clothes. Our school uniform is green. Boys' winter wear is grey tousers or shorts, white shirt or thin polo-necked top, green sweater and optional green and white striped tie. Their summer wear is the same except that they can wear a T-shirt (preferably white or green). Girls' winter wear is a grey skirt or pinafore dress and the same as the boys on their top half. Their summer wear is a green and white checked dress and green cardigan. Uniform isn't compulsory but is preferred. We mostly wear denim jeans with a T-shirt or sweater for play. Trainers are good as play shoes. For best, girls like pretty dresses or dungarees, and the boys have smart trousers and sweaters. We sleep in pyjamas or nightdresses and have shorts and T-shirts for P.E.
